title: Bert Proposed To His Fiancée...Again?!
description:
Last year, Bert just dropped a MAJOR bombshell on us in the middle of a segment. It was the announcement of his engagement to his fiancée Tiffany. 
The proposal wasn't as special as he wanted it to be. So what di he do? Repropose during vacation. Listen!
